mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( NO ,BNO ,CONTENT ,WRITER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{bno} , #{content} , 999999 )
mapper.select: SELECT R.NO ,R.BNO ,R.CONTENT ,R.WRITER_NO ,R.ENROLL_DATE ,R.STATUS ,E.NAME AS writerName FROM REPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (R.WRITER_NO = E.NO) WHERE R.BNO = #{bno} AND R.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC
